ygData.subject: Re: Signing up PacNet
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems that Verant has fixed some networking issues during the latest patch. I rarely get any disconnection anymore. Prior to that, I always get disconnected
ygData.messageBody:
It seems that Verant has fixed some networking issues during the latest
patch. I rarely get any disconnection anymore. Prior to that, I always get
disconnected 7 to 8 times per hour. I am using 56K Analog dial-up from
Cyberway.

I think you need to be subscribed for at least 3 months before you can
terminate your account for Cyberway. The same goes for Pacific Net but I am
not sure about SingNet.

Now that Verant has fixed the network problem. I will encouraged you to get
Cyberway to play your EQ.

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 10:49 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Signing up PacNet


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> I'm also thinking of getting a unlimited usage acct, and I know cyberway
> got this $48 unlimited usage plan. Can anyone advise me if there is any
> additional condition for this plan (say must subscibr for at least 6 mth
> etc)?.
>
> How abt PI and Singnet? Which one shld I go for? Any initial
subscription
> fee or attached condition?
